headline: How could ESPN streaming impact Disney financials?
summary: Investing.com -- Walt Disney Co. (NYSE:DIS)’s direct-to-consumer ESPN streaming launch could offset linear TV declines and contribute to earnings growth, Barclays Research said in a recent report.
